title: Assessment of the Phytotoxicity of HNTs on Two Plants, Cynodon dactylon and Brassica rapa L
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00897E, Paper
Ming Huang, Jiawei Huang, Haohong Yu, Qili Fangzhang, Mingxian Liu
Nanomaterials show promising potential as agrochemical carriers, but the safety of the nanoparticles toward crops should be assessed systematically. Here, Cynodon dactylon and Brassica rapa L are used as plant...
